last_episode_to_air.name: Ideal Girlfriend and Girlfriend
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kazuya's date to cheer up Chizuru comes to an end, but he doesn't think he's being very helpful. What he is sure of is that he is in love with her, but what Chizuru feels about him remains a mystery for our protagonist.

name: Rent-a-Girlfriend
overview: Kinoshita Kazuya is a 20-year-old failure of a college student. He managed to kiss his girlfriend once, but was dumped after a month. Completely spiteful, Kazuya uses a certain method to date a girl. He goes to their meeting place and a beautiful girl brushing her long, black hair behind her ear was there, smiling at him. Her name was Mizuhara Chizuru. Something real is born after just a single rental! A reckless rom-com filled with love and excitement is about to begin!

episodes.name: Rent-a-Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Jilted and heartbroken, 20-year-old Kinoshita Kazuya turns to Diamond, a Rent-A-Girlfriend app that leads him to a fateful encounter with Mizuhara Chizuru, one of the talents on offer.

episodes.name: Ex-Girlfriend and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Immediately after deciding not to rely on pretend dating anymore, Kazuya is hit with a triple whammy of reveals: Chizuru not only goes to his college but lives next door to him, and his grandmother is coming to visit and wants to see her.

episodes.name: Beach and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Kazuya barely has time to deal with the fallout of the situation in the pub before the gang heads off on a short trip to Izu, where they run into someone unexpected.

episodes.name: Friend and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Mami’s plan comes to a head as Kazuya decides to set the story straight, to mixed reactions.

episodes.name: Hot Springs and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: The aftermath of the ferry incident signals a clear shift in Kazuya’s feelings. Meanwhile, there’s a conspiracy brewing at the hot springs inn he and his family decide to visit.

episodes.name: Girlfriend and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Having to spend a night in the same room with Chizuru sends Kazuya’s heart and mind racing. Meanwhile, Kuribayashi Shun has a surprise in store…

episodes.name: Provisional Girlfriend and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: While Kazuya desperately tries to get Ruka to promise she won’t reveal his secret, she tells him her own.

episodes.name: Christmas and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Christmas rolls around with Kazuya not having met Chizuru for ages, and he sees something he never wanted to see.

episodes.name: Lies and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Ruka is hellbent on knowing the full story behind Kazuya and Chizuru’s relationship, and once she does she decides to take action.

episodes.name: Friend’s Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Kazuya learns that Kuribayashi's been down in the dumps and tries to figure out how he can help him.

episodes.name: Truth and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: On Chizuru's request, Kazuya goes on a practice date with Sumi, another rental girlfriend. Will he actually be able to help her and stay out of trouble while he's at it?

episodes.name: Confession and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Chizuru and Mami go on an awkward rental date unaware that Kazuya has seen them together. How can Chizuru handle this situation?

episodes.name: Dream and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: As Mizuhara looks set to quit the rental girlfriend business, Kazuya goes to watch a play, one that could be pivotal to their relationship.

episodes.name: The Usual Girlfriend
episodes.overview: As the fallout from the play becomes clear, things go back to normal between Mizuhara and Kazuya, until...?

episodes.name: The Return of the Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Mizuhara has lost the key to her apartment and comes to Kazuya for some reason... and she's not the only unexpected visitor!

episodes.name: Night and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Kazuya has barely dealt with the aftermath of Mami's visit when he gets another aggressive visitor!

episodes.name: Birthday and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Kazuya tries to clear the misunderstanding Chizuru is under, all while enlisting Sumi's help to get her a fitting birthday present.

episodes.name: Booze and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: As Kazuya wonders if his birthday gift was good enough, he and Chizuru find themselves in a crisis in the form of a boozer.

episodes.name: Ex and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Kazuya wakes up with the worst hangover ever and struggles with his fragmented memories. Meanwhile, someone finds out about his workplace and decides to make an appearance.

episodes.name: Youth and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Kazuya decides to spend his all-day date with Mizuhara reclaiming his lost youth... in a very peculiar fashion.

episodes.name: Kiss and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: When Nagomi hears that Chizuru's birthday has already passed, she decides to throw a combined party for both her and Kazuya, and she refuses to take no for an answer!

episodes.name: Ring and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Kazuya can barely process Ruka's actions when Nagomi decides to drop another bomb on the party.

episodes.name: Guide and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Kazuya has hardly begun to process the fallout from his birthday when he gets asked to go on another practice date with Sumi, this time with her taking the lead!

episodes.name: Girlfriend and Me
episodes.overview: Chizuru reflects on her journey to get her here, and Kazuya acts on his idea to help her.

episodes.name: Home Cooking and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Kazuya and Chizuru have decided to make a movie together so that Granny Sayuri can see it. That's all well and good, but now they have to sit down and work out all the details.

episodes.name: Girlfriend Next Door
episodes.overview: Ruka demands an explanation from Kazuya and Chizuru, and Mini overhears it all going down! What will she do with this information?

episodes.name: Expert and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: With the momentum of the crowdfunding campaign stalling, Kazuya must turn to Mini, who happens to be an expert on the matter!

episodes.name: D-Day and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Mini's earnest appeal makes things awkward. Meanwhile, Umi makes a request in return for retweeting the campaign.

episodes.name: Filming and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Filming for the movie begins, and seeing her act in the flesh, Kazuya realizes that Chizuru exists in a whole different dimension from him. Meanwhile, Mini is hatching a plot of her own.

episodes.name: Final Scene and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Kazuya and Chizuru end up at a ski resort, finding themselves having to shoot the final scene for the movie all on their own. Chizuru decides she has something to say to Kazuya.

episodes.name: Kazuya and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: It's Ruka's birthday, and Kazuya has to stay true to his word and grant her anything she desires. But what does she want, really?

episodes.name: Family and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Sayuri tags along with Kazuya and Chizuru as they scout out the cinema they'll be screening their movie in, and it brings back memories for her.

episodes.name: Parting and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: With Sayuri's prospects looking bleak, Kazuya pulls off the only thing he can do for Chizuru and her.

episodes.name: Spontaneous Trip and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Not knowing what to do, Kazuya looks to good old Sumi for advice. She decides to take him on a trip to help clear his mind.

episodes.name: Girlfriend and Boyfriend
episodes.overview: Kazuya decides to rent Chizuru out for an entire day and puts together a date plan to help cheer her up. Will he be successful?

episodes.name: Ideal Girlfriend and Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Kazuya's date to cheer up Chizuru comes to an end, but he doesn't think he's being very helpful. What he is sure of is that he is in love with her, but what Chizuru feels about him remains a mystery for our protagonist.
